sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; function SchemesExplorer() { const [state, setState] = useState('All'); const allSchemes = [ // Central Schemes { name: 'PM-KISAN', summary: 'Direct income support to farmers.', state: 'All', url: 'https://pmkisan.gov.in/' }, { name: 'Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana', summary: 'Crop insurance for farmers.', state: 'All', url: 'https://pmfby.gov.in/' }, { name: 'Soil Health Card', summary: 'Provides soil health cards to farmers.', state: 'All', url: 'https://soilhealth.dac.gov.in/' }, { name: 'Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchai Yojana', summary: 'Improved irrigation and water use.', state: 'All', url: 'https://pmksy.gov.in/' }, { name: 'e-NAM', summary: 'Online trading platform for agricultural commodities.', state: 'All', url: 'https://enam.gov.in/web/' }, { name: 'Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana', summary: 'Boosts agricultural growth.', state: 'All', url: 'https://rkvy.nic.in/' }, // State Schemes { name: 'KALIA', summary: 'Comprehensive assistance for cultivators.', state: 'Odisha', url: 'https://kalia.odisha.gov.in/' }, { name: 'Rythu Bandhu', summary: 'Investment support for farmers.', state: 'Telangana', url: 'https://treasury.telangana.gov.in/rythubandhu/' }, { name: 'Mukhya Mantri Krishi Ashirwad', summary: 'Direct benefit transfer for farmers.', state: 'Jharkhand', url: 'https://mmkasy.jharkhand.gov.in/' }, { name: 'Krishi Yantra Subsidy', summary: 'Subsidy on farm machinery.', state: 'Maharashtra', url: 'https://mahaagri.gov.in/Site/Home/Department_of_Agriculture,_Maharashtra_State,_India' }, { name: 'YSR Rythu Bharosa', summary: 'Investment support for farmers.', state: 'Andhra Pradesh', url: 'https://ysrrythubharosa.ap.gov.in/' }, { name: 'Bhavantar Bhugtan Yojana', summary: 'Price difference payment scheme.', state: 'Madhya Pradesh', url: 'http://mpkrishi.mp.gov.in/' }, { name: 'Rajiv Gandhi Kisan Nyay Yojana', summary: 'Income support for farmers.', state: 'Chhattisgarh', url: 'https://rgkny.cg.nic.in/' }, { name: 'Krishak Bandhu', summary: 'Financial assistance to farmers.', state: 'West Bengal', url: 'https://krishakbandhu.net/' }, { name: 'Zero Interest Crop Loan', summary: 'Interest-free crop loans.', state: 'Karnataka', url: 'https://raitamitra.karnataka.gov.in/' }, { name: 'Farmer Accident Insurance', summary: 'Insurance for farmers.', state: 'Punjab', url: 'https://agripb.gov.in/' }, { name: 'Chief Minister Krishi Sa Sajuli Yojana', summary: 'Farm tool distribution.', state: 'Assam', url: 'https://diragri.assam.gov.in/' }, { name: 'Pandit Deendayal Upadhyay Kisan Samrudhi Yojana', summary: 'Farm prosperity scheme.', state: 'Gujarat', url: 'https://dag.gujarat.gov.in/' }, { name: 'Mukhya Mantri Kisan Aaye Badhotri Solar Yojana', summary: 'Solar pumps for farmers.', state: 'Delhi', url: 'https://mnre.gov.in/' }, { name: 'Mukhya Mantri Krishak Mitra Yojana', summary: 'Support for small/marginal farmers.', state: 'Rajasthan', url: 'https://agriculture.rajasthan.gov.in/' }, { name: 'Mukhya Mantri Krishi Samagra Vikas Yojana', summary: 'Comprehensive agri development.', state: 'Bihar', url: 'https://dbtagriculture.bihar.gov.in/' }, { name: 'Mukhya Mantri Krishi Samman Nidhi', summary: 'Income support for farmers.', state: 'Haryana', url: 'https://fasalhry.in/' }, { name: 'Mukhya Mantri Krishi Udyog Yojana', summary: 'Agro-industries promotion.', state: 'Uttarakhand', url: 'https://agriculture.uk.gov.in/' }, { name: 'Organic Farming Policy', summary: 'Promotes organic farming.', state: 'Sikkim', url: 'https://www.sikkim.gov.in/departments/food-security-&-agriculture-development-department' }, { name: 'Mukhya Mantri Krishi Samriddhi Yojana', summary: 'Farm prosperity scheme.', state: 'Goa', url: 'https://www.goa.gov.in/schemes/' }, // Add more as needed for completeness ]; const states = [ 'All', 'Andhra Pradesh', 'Arunachal Pradesh', 'Assam', 'Bihar', 'Chhattisgarh', 'Goa', 'Gujarat', 'Haryana', 'Himachal Pradesh', 'Jharkhand', 'Karnataka', 'Kerala', 'Madhya Pradesh', 'Maharashtra', 'Manipur', 'Meghalaya', 'Mizoram', 'Nagaland', 'Odisha', 'Punjab', 'Rajasthan', 'Sikkim', 'Tamil Nadu', 'Telangana', 'Tripura', 'Uttar Pradesh', 'Uttarakhand', 'West Bengal', // Union Territories 'Andaman and Nicobar Islands', 'Chandigarh', 'Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu', 'Delhi', 'Jammu and Kashmir', 'Ladakh', 'Lakshadweep', 'Puducherry' ]; const schemes = state === 'All' ? allSchemes : allSchemes.filter(s => s.state === state || s.state === 'All'); return (

🏛️ Active Farmer Schemes

{schemes.map((scheme, i) => (
🌱 {scheme.name} {scheme.state}
{scheme.summary}
Apply / Learn More →
))}
{/* General Government Enquiry Links */}

🔗 Official Government Portals

🌾 PM-KISAN Official Portal 🇮🇳 Ministry of Agriculture, India 🧪 Soil Health Card Portal 📋 All Major Schemes (Govt. List)
); } export default SchemesExplorer;
